@dev Initializes the BasketCore contract in proxy.
@dev Updates the BasketManager contract.
@dev Retrieves the BasketManager contract address.

devdoc.details: The main functionality of BasketCore is to maintain the following invariant:         Total supply of basket token = Sum of token balancesBasketCore is the owner of BasketToken, so it mints and burns BasketToken. It does not manage the token basket which is the responsibility of BasketManager.BasketCore only handle one-to-one minting, redemption and swap. Depositer must approve to the BasketCore contract.

getFeeReceiver().details: Retrieves the fee receiver contract address.

getTokenBalance(address).details: Returns the current balance of the underlying asset.

initialize().details: Initializes the BasketCore contract in proxy.

mint(address,address,uint256,uint256).details: Mints new basket token by depositing underlying asset. For minting, if there is any mint fee, it must be charged with the basket token.

params.amount: The amount of underlying asset deposited.
params.feeAmount: The amount fee charged on minting.
params.sourceAddress: The address of the user who mints new basket tokens.
params.tokenAddress: The address of the underlying asset deposited.

returns._0: The amount of basket token minted.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

redeem(address,address,uint256,uint256).details: Redeems basket tokens and withdraws the underlying asset. For redemption, if there is any redemption fee, it must be charged with the basket token.

params.amount: The amount of basket token to redeem.
params.feeAmount: The amount of fee charged on redemption.
params.sourceAddress: The address of the user who redeems existing basket tokens.
params.tokenAddress: The address of the underlying asset to withdraw.

returns._0: The amount of underlying asset withdrawn.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

swap(address,address,address,uint256,uin.details: Swaps two underlying assets. The swap fee can be charged in either input token or output token.

params.amount: The amount of input token to swap in.
params.inputFee: The amount of input token to pay as fee, if any.
params.inputToken: The address of the input token.
params.outputFee: The amount of output token to pay as fee, if any.
params.outputToken: The address of the output token.
params.sourceAddress: The address of the user who swaps underlying assets.

returns._0: The amount of output token swap out.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

userdoc.notice: Core of the composite token basket.
